_header: Now the Father and the Son and the Holy Ghost
_description: The Croxton Play of the Sacrament — 927 lines, generally in quatrains (abab)

TCD652.First Lines:
Now þe father & þe sune & þe holy gosteThat
                    al þis wyde worlde hat wrowghte…
TCD652.Last Lines:
…And in wyrshyppe of thys name gloryowsTo syng to hys honore
                        Te deum laudamus
TCD652.Attributed Title:
Thus endyth the play of the blyssyd sacrament Whyche myracle was done in
                    the forest of Aragoun In the famous Cite Eraclea the yere of owr lord God
                        ml cccc lxj to whome be honowr Amen (f. 355)
